amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the purpose of encouraging the approval and development of privatized housing for unaccompanied service members.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
